Description.Text: Polmaily House Hotel is a moderate-sized country house offering a total of 14 bedrooms, set in 20 acres of mixed gardens and woodland only 17.5 miles (28 km) away from Inverness. It offers a relaxed, homely atmosphere where guests can unwind and be served by friendly staff. The hotel itself is located in the beautiful wooded valley of Glen Affric, about 3 miles from the village of Drumnadrochit and the mysterious Loch Ness. Enjoy the hotel grounds, our indoor-heated swimming pool, tennis court, experience the woodland fragrance and let children enjoy our many play facilities such as bikes, table tennis, playroom and rabbits. Here we offer space and traquillity - a place where you can totally relax.
